metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12713 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description: GIMP through 2.10.2 makes g_get_tmp_dir calls to establish temporaryfilenames, which may result in a filename that already exists, asdemonstrated by the gimp_write_and_read_file function inapp/tests/test-xcf.c. This might be leveraged by attackers to overwritefiles or read file content that was intended to be private.

criterions.comment: gimp package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
